name: Ai & Me
description:
PROTOTYPE ONLY

My entry for the DevSquad Academy Halloween Jam 2021.

NOTE: Ran out off time, so presenting a playable prototype. So, do not expect to be judged, but someone may find some silly fun in this what is now a 5 minute game:) We will get it to a more completed state if anyone is interested.

Your someone, somewhere, and something is looking for mushrooms. Are you a mushroom?

Find all the mushrooms to gain access to the exit at dawn!

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

CTRL - Crouch

P - Pause Game

Left Mouse Button - Pickup 

Right Mouse Button - Interact

C - Distract Ai. He will come to the location the noise is made.

NO RUN - You must out wit the Ai which is possible as he is silly and goofy. But quick!

Assets not made by us are from Megascans. Ai is a fan made HN. Horror and Tension sounds from Marketplace. The rest is us including SFX.
